top.title: Congress approves bill to release Epstein files that will head to Trump's desk
top.summary: Once Trump signs the measure, the justice department will have 30 days to release the materials.

top.title: Lebanon says Israeli strike killed 13 people near Palestinian refugee camp
top.summary: The Israeli military says it targeted Hamas members "operating in a training compound", which Hamas rejected as "fabrication and lies".

top.title: Judge rules Meta doesn't have monopoly after Instagram, WhatsApp acquisitions

top.title: Baby Shark: How a 90-second clip created a $400m business
top.summary: Shares in the firm behind the highly-addictive children's song rose by more than 9% in their stock market debut.

top.title: Roblox blocks children from chatting to adult strangers
